properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu vachedan nannucherchumu Nan nee raktamanduna shuddhuni jeyumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O yesu rakshakaa nee pilpuvindunu calvaripai naa paapamu nivruttichesiti{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nenaite papini neeve naa praapavu naa dosha mella kadigi Pavitraparchumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aashaktudanou nan neeve staapinchumu visvasa dairyabalamul naalo puttinchumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu vimochakaa Yesu maa sharanu Yesu maa daivadhyaanamu neeve maa rajuvu{/lang-eng}
